activities.name: Estimating the Quantifiable Characteristics of Products, Events, or Information
activities.description: Estimating sizes, distances, and quantities; or determining time, costs, resources, or materials needed to perform a work activity.

activities.name: Identifying Objects, Actions, and Events
activities.description: Identifying information by categorizing, estimating, recognizing differences or similarities, and detecting changes in circumstances or events.

activities.name: Inspecting Equipment, Structures, or Materials
activities.description: Inspecting equipment, structures, or materials to identify the cause of errors or other problems or defects.

activities.name: Getting Information
activities.description: Observing, receiving, and otherwise obtaining information from all relevant sources.

activities.name: Monitoring Processes, Materials, or Surroundings
activities.description: Monitoring and reviewing information from materials, events, or the environment, to detect or assess problems.

activities.name: Monitoring and Controlling Resources
activities.description: Monitoring and controlling resources and overseeing the spending of money.

activities.name: Performing Administrative Activities
activities.description: Performing day-to-day administrative tasks such as maintaining information files and processing paperwork.

activities.name: Staffing Organizational Units
activities.description: Recruiting, interviewing, selecting, hiring, and promoting employees in an organization.

activities.name: Assisting and Caring for Others
activities.description: Providing personal assistance, medical attention, emotional support, or other personal care to others such as coworkers, customers, or patients.

activities.name: Communicating with People Outside the Organization
activities.description: Communicating with people outside the organization, representing the organization to customers, the public, government, and other external sources.

activities.name: Communicating with Supervisors, Peers, or Subordinates
activities.description: Providing information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.

activities.name: Establishing and Maintaining Interpersonal Relationships
activities.description: Developing constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintaining them over time.

activities.name: Interpreting the Meaning of Information for Others
activities.description: Translating or explaining what information means and how it can be used.

activities.name: Performing for or Working Directly with the Public
activities.description: Performing for people or dealing directly with the public. This includes serving customers in restaurants and stores, and receiving clients or guests.

activities.name: Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others
activities.description: Handling complaints, settling disputes, and resolving grievances and conflicts, or otherwise negotiating with others.

activities.name: Selling or Influencing Others
activities.description: Convincing others to buy merchandise/goods or to otherwise change their minds or actions.

activities.name: Coaching and Developing Others
activities.description: Identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.

activities.name: Coordinating the Work and Activities of Others
activities.description: Getting members of a group to work together to accomplish tasks.

activities.name: Developing and Building Teams
activities.description: Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.

activities.name: Guiding, Directing, and Motivating Subordinates
activities.description: Providing guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance.

activities.name: Providing Consultation and Advice to Others
activities.description: Providing guidance and expert advice to management or other groups on technical, systems-, or process-related topics.

activities.name: Training and Teaching Others
activities.description: Identifying the educational needs of others, developing formal educational or training programs or classes, and teaching or instructing others.

activities.name: Analyzing Data or Information
activities.description: Identifying the underlying principles, reasons, or facts of information by breaking down information or data into separate parts.

activities.name: Evaluating Information to Determine Compliance with Standards
activities.description: Using relevant information and individual judgment to determine whether events or processes comply with laws, regulations, or standards.

activities.name: Judging the Qualities of Objects, Services, or People
activities.description: Assessing the value, importance, or quality of things or people.

activities.name: Processing Information
activities.description: Compiling, coding, categorizing, calculating, tabulating, auditing, or verifying information or data.

activities.name: Developing Objectives and Strategies
activities.description: Establishing long-range objectives and specifying the strategies and actions to achieve them.

activities.name: Making Decisions and Solving Problems
activities.description: Analyzing information and evaluating results to choose the best solution and solve problems.

activities.name: Organizing, Planning, and Prioritizing Work
activities.description: Developing specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish your work.

activities.name: Scheduling Work and Activities
activities.description: Scheduling events, programs, and activities, as well as the work of others.

activities.name: Thinking Creatively
activities.description: Developing, designing, or creating new applications, ideas, relationships, systems, or products, including artistic contributions.

activities.name: Updating and Using Relevant Knowledge
activities.description: Keeping up-to-date technically and applying new knowledge to your job.

activities.name: Documenting/Recording Information
activities.description: Entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information in written or electronic/magnetic form.

activities.name: Drafting, Laying Out, and Specifying Technical Devices, Parts, and Equipment
activities.description: Providing documentation, detailed instructions, drawings, or specifications to tell others about how devices, parts, equipment, or structures are to be fabricated, constructed, assembled, modified, maintained, or used.

activities.name: Repairing and Maintaining Electronic Equipment
activities.description: Servicing, repairing, calibrating, regulating, fine-tuning, or testing machines, devices, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of electrical or electronic (not mechanical) principles.

activities.name: Repairing and Maintaining Mechanical Equipment
activities.description: Servicing, repairing, adjusting, and testing machines, devices, moving parts, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of mechanical (not electronic) principles.

activities.name: Working with Computers
activities.description: Using computers and computer systems (including hardware and software) to program, write software, set up functions, enter data, or process information.

activities.name: Controlling Machines and Processes
activities.description: Using either control mechanisms or direct physical activity to operate machines or processes (not including computers or vehicles).

activities.name: Handling and Moving Objects
activities.description: Using hands and arms in handling, installing, positioning, and moving materials, and manipulating things.

activities.name: Operating Vehicles, Mechanized Devices, or Equipment
activities.description: Running, maneuvering, navigating, or driving vehicles or mechanized equipment, such as forklifts, passenger vehicles, aircraft, or watercraft.

activities.name: Performing General Physical Activities
activities.description: Performing general physical activities includes doing activities that require considerable use of your arms and legs and moving your whole body, such as climbing, lifting, balancing, walking, stooping, and handling materials.
